Small acts of kindness with global impact
Image of children standing around the globe
The Be My Eyes app connects you with a sighted volunteer or company representative. Using live video chat, this person can assist with visual tasks or describe things that youâ€™d like to see.
Be My Eyes lets you lend your eyesight to people who need it. Sign up, join our global network and make a big difference in the everyday lives of people without sight all over the world.
